descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Facundo Campazzo bounces a pass past the defenders to Nikola Jokic for a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Campazzo's dime finds Jokic for a dunk) 2021/05/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Campazzo's dime finds Jokic for a dunk

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic powers through Nikola Jokic for a short floater.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nurkic muscles through Jokic for bucket) 2021/05/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nurkic muscles through Jokic for bucket

videos.description: Nikola Jokic fakes the dribble handoff and blows by Carmelo Anthony to stuff down a two-handed slam in the lane.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Joker blows by Melo for a slam) 2021/05/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Joker blows by Melo for a slam

videos.description: Damian Lillard throws a full-court pass to Norman Powell who elevates to hammer down an emphatic jam on the fast break.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard tosses to Powell for the throwdown) 2021/05/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard tosses to Powell for the throwdown
